movie.title: In Her Shoes
movie.writer: Jennifer Weiner (based on the novel by), Susannah Grant (screenplay)
movie.actors: Cameron Diaz, Anson Mount, Toni Collette, Richard Burgi
movie.plot: Two sisters, plus a dead mother, a remarried father, and a hostile step-mother. The sisters, each in her way, have perfected the art of losing. The elder, Rose, is an attorney, responsible, lonely, with a closet full of shoes. The younger is Maggie, beautiful, selfish, and irresponsible. Her drunken behavior gets her tossed by her step-mother from her dad's house; worse behavior gets her tossed from Rose's apartment. Then, while searching in her father's desk for money to filch, Maggie finds an address; the past and the future open up to her and, with any luck, may open to her sister as well.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 1 win & 5 nominations.
movie.tomatoConsensus: Honesty and solid performances make In Her Shoes a solid fit for all audiences.
